      参数类型为EntityItem的net.minecraftforge.event.entity.item中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ItemEvent(EntityItem itemEntity)
      Creates a new event for an EntityItem.
      ItemExpireEvent(EntityItem entityItem, int extraLife)
      Creates a new event for an expiring EntityItem.
      ItemTossEvent(EntityItem entityItem, EntityPlayer player)
      Creates a new event for EntityItems tossed by a player.
